alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 20 at 9:35AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flow in Tonto Creek has increased above Action Stage making unbridged crossings unsafe to cross. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Unbridged crossings in Punkin Center and Tonto Basin are expected to be or become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 931 AM MST, an upstream gauge on Tonto Creek was above action stage with downstream impacts to low water crossings expected. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - Flooding is occurring along the Tonto Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin and Punkin Center. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
